ygData.subject: Re: ___JBoots___
ygData.msgSnippet: We hunted in CB for some hours...let s saz five. Because everything was camped except for the trainer, we camped him. We killed him about ten times and got two
ygData.messageBody:
We hunted in CB for some hours...let's saz five. Because everything was
camped except for the trainer, we camped him. We killed him about ten times
and got two Shiny Brass Shields. If it is also so easy to get the JBoots,
I'm happy :-). Maybe it was pure luck, but it really took us a minimum of
effort...

Aanin, Dwarven Cleric on Solusek Ro



>From: "Rebecca" <indrika@...>
>
>its part of the anti camping campaign i think... they put respawns on some
>items to be rediculously long.
>I've played the game for 17 levels now, killed the trainer i don't know how
>many times, and just recently got my first ever shiny brass shield in
>crushbone :) Pure luck i suppose, that at the time no one was camping
>him. - they all got tired of waiting so long for the eq to repop.
>----- Original Message -----
>From: dracon_the_wizard <dracon_the_wizard@...>
>To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 5:05 PM
>Subject: [EQCheats] ___JBoots___
>
>
>> From: "dracon_the_wizard" <dracon_the_wizard@...>
>>
>> I was camping in najena for Jboots for 6 hours and didnt see any boots,
>the
>> guy that was first in line for the boots had been there for 26 hours
>> straight and had only seen one pair! Is there some sort of trick or
>secret
>> to obtain these boots?
>>
